karsabi-alpha-class-star-wing-squadron-n.ability: While attacking a ship, if there is at least 1 friendly unengaged squadron with BOMBER within distance 1 of you, you may add a red die to your attack pool.

kalani-sheathipede-class-shuttle-nexus.name: Sheathipede Class Shuttle
kalani-sheathipede-class-shuttle-nexus.ability: At the start of the Squadron Phase, you may move up to distance 3 and toggle your activation slider to the activated side. If you do, the first 4 non-unique squadrons with **AI** that you activate at distance 1-2 of this squadron gain **Rogue** this phase.
